title: ODW: Casemanagement Service: Development of a congruent database
description:
Description
First step
The new attributes in Kundenanliegen shall be added to the Kundenanliegen-entitity on Appl. Area SERV.
Following Attributes are new:
Inbox_Channel__c
Next_Call_Reason__c
Feedback_Classification__c
source_system (origin__c)
Configurator__c
External_ConfiguratorId__c
Inbox_Service__c
Inbox_Email__c
EosId__c
Class__c
Transfer_Reason__c
vbkz__c
Second step
The 14 key figures shall be implemented.
https://wiki.telekom.de/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=2559345904
New information in Kundenanliegen_Historie for transfer_reason and class shall be provided. This information is usefull for creating keyfigure "VorgÃ¤nge Eingang" (Incoming issues).
Third step
Create the reference information on ODW.
https://wiki.telekom.de/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=2547674728
Fourth step
Deploy tables for the export.
Define and deploy UC4 schedule.
The transfer form ODW to FCI shall be clarified.
Create data set for testing in production with Reinhard Sippel.
Enlarge Harvester Information with load statistics information from ODW
Compliance --> see Maintenance Epic
see DATASAT-26959
ATTENTION: User stories are still missing here.
Initial delivery?
daily delta or daily full?
